pageContext.claim: “Farmers have not been doing well for 15 years. Mexico, Canada, China and others have treated them unfairly. By the time I finish trade talks, that will change. Big trade barriers against U.S. farmers, and other businesses, will finally be broken. Massive trade deficits no longer!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump fails to understand that the trade deficit is not only the result the buying of goods and services but is impacted by other macroeconomic factors, such as the relative strength of currencies, economic growth rates, and savings and investment rates. The president's tax bill will almost surely widen trade deficits because it is causing the budget deficit to spike, so the United States must borrow more from foreign investors.
